14. Extracting Powerpoint Presentation Information using Python

    • Cover Page


      14. Extracting Powerpoint Presentation Information using Python
      Date : 23-September-2020




    • 1. Extracting information from Powerpoint Document


      Requirment :

      To create Boardwalk Repository we need to extract information from various types of files.
      Microsoft Office Documents such as Microsoft Word, Microsoft Powerpoint and Microsoft Excel files are the most commonly used documents by the users.
      Acrobat PDF files are also used in ReadOnly mode to share the information by the users.




    • 2. Python Support for Data Extraction


      Every document saves information in a specific format and needs the related libraries to read that docucement for extracting the information.

      The information extracted from the file includes the Structure of Document i.e. the Metadata (you can call it Data of Information) and the Information itself.

      Python support some libraries like Python-pptx to read the Microsoft Powerpoint Presentation.

      python-pptx

      Release v0.6.18 (Installation)

      python-pptx is a Python library for creating and updating Microsoft Powerpoint (.pptx) files. Click here

      Check this URL on how to install python-pptx library





    • 3. python-pptx API


      Using python-pptx library enable user to extract the structure information of Powerpoint Presentation.

      A Powerpoint Presentation contains Slides, Placeholders, Tables, Paragraphs, Shapes and User Notes.

      Following are the objects that are included in python-pptx library to extract the information from Powerpoint Presentation.







    • 4. Form Interface


      Following image display the form Interface for Extraction of Information from the Powerpoint Presentation.



      The functionality of Capture PowerPoint Document Form Interface is as follows :
      It allows user to select a PowerPoint Presentation Document from the local drive.
      It displays the definitions of the Object, Properties and Property Description defined by python-pptx library. This information is read from the Framework Setting Excel document i.e. "FrameworkForPowerpointDocument.xlsx".
      It displays the Object Properties of the selected PowerPoint Docuement in Read-only mode.
      It displays the Text inside the selected PowerPoint Document.
      It displays the list of Paragraphs in selected PowerPoint Document.
      It displays the Text in each Paragraph and Shape.
      It displays the list of Runs in each selected Paragraph.
      It displays the the Details of each selected Run of selected Paragraph.
      It displays the Raw data extracted from Slides in the selected PowerPoint Document in JSON format.




    • 5. Python Libraries Used


      The required information to be extracted from the PowerPoint Doucument is saved in the Framework created in Microsoft Excel.

      To read this Framework Settings from Excel file, openpyxl python library is used.

      The openpyxl library is downloaded from here

      To read the PowerPoint document and extract related Objects defined in Framework Settings, python-pptx library is used.

      The python-pptx library is downloaded from here

      To read Tabuler data from Office Document, python pandas library is used.

      Following image shows the downloaded python libraries in Pycharm Settings window:





    • 6. Framework Settings


      The information to be extracted from the PowerPoint Document is defined in an Excel File, this definition is called as Framework Settings.

      The name of Framework setting Excel Document is "FrameworkForPowerpointDocument.xlsx" and it is saved in same folder where python programm is running.

      Following image shows the defined Framework Setting :



      The Framework Settings for extracting the PowerPoint Document information contains following elements.

      a. Headings : The Heading is the object defined by python-pptx Api.
      b. Elements : The property name of the object defined by python-pptx Api.
      c. Format : The data type and size of the object property defined by python-pptx Api. For example, datetime, string, boolean, numeric.
      d. Method : Details of the method defined by python-pptx Api. Methods are not stored in Framework Settings.
      e. Notes : Description of object properties defined by python-pptx Api.
      f. PythonCall : Python method call to extract the object properties from the selected PowerPoint Document.




    • 7. Python Programs




      Following are the Python programs developed to extract PowerPoint Presentation Information:

      1. mainModulePptx.py : This file contails the main() function i.e. the starting fucntion of the program.

      2. pptWindow.py : This file contains the Form Interace design.

      3. frameworkSettings.py : This file contains the functionality related to reading the Framework Setting Excel file and displaying the Object Properties related settings.

      4. PowerpointDocFile.py : This file contains the methods to Open the selected PowerPoint Presentation and Reading the selected Object properties of selected PowerPoint Document.





    • 8. Downloads and Links


      1. pythonPowerPointModules.7z : Zip file containing python modules to extract PowerPoint Presentation Document and Framework Settings in Excel Document.
      (mainModulePptx.py, pptWindow.py, frameworkSettings.py, PowerpointDocFile.py, FrameworkForPowerpointDocument.xlsx)

      2. python-pptx
      Release v0.6.18 (Installation)
      python-pptx is a Python library for creating and updating Microsoft PopwerPoint Presentation (.pptx) files.
      Setup Command : pip install python-pptx

      3. openpyxl
      Version : openpyxl 3.0.4
      Setup command : pip install openpyxl

      4. pandas
      Version : pandas 1.0.5
      Setup command : pip install pandas
